meanings.definition: A person who speaks on behalf of a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The spokespeople for the company addressed the media.
meanings.sent2: The spokespeople provided updates on behalf of the team.
meanings.sent3: The spokespeople joked about having to talk for everyone at the meeting.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the character acted as the spokespeople for the entire village.
meanings.sent5: The spokespeople stood out with their eloquent speeches.

meanings.sent1: Several spokespeople were present at the press conference.
meanings.sent2: The spokespeople shared different viewpoints during the discussion.
meanings.sent3: At the event, the spokespeople formed a circle to chat.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the voices of the spokespeople.
meanings.sent5: The spokespeople united to convey a powerful message.
